title: Grand Master

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may publicly execute a player during the day, this does not use todays execution.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot be prevented from using your ability by any possible means.
- You lose immortal defense if you are the only remaining Eversol member excluding sleeper agents.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Establish House Eversol’s authority over the multiverse.

desc:
Post 5223
*” A reminder to all staff that treason is the highest crime you can commit. “*
